content:
do we have test cases for the new bpo logic? Would be good to have a few like:
- currentForkId=osakaForkId,nextForkId=forkId(osakaForkId,bpo1ActivationTime),lastForkId=forkId(osakaBpo4ForkId, bpo5ActivationTime)
- currentForkId=osakaForkId,nextForkId=forkId(osakaBpo4ForkId,bpo5ActivationTime),lastForkId=forkId(osakaForkId, amsterdamActivationTime)

does the 2nd case make sense/look correct? might be good to add those to the eip for some clarification
